page-experience.title: Experience
page-experience.description: A timeline of my professional journey and key achievements in the tech industry.

page-about.description1: Currently training in web development, I specialize in creating modern websites and web applications. I am proficient in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, and have solid back-end experience with PHP, Python, and NodeJS.
page-about.description2: I also work with tools such as Git and GitHub for code versioning, and am familiar with WordPress for custom website development. I have acquired practical skills in creating e-commerce websites and am able to develop customized solutions tailored to the specific needs of projects.
page-about.description3: Thanks to my ability to learn quickly and my passion for web development, I am always looking for new challenges to improve myself!

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Led the development of enterprise level applications, managing a team of 5 developers and implementing modern development practices
achievements: Successfully delivered 3 major projects on time and under budget
Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization
Mentored junior developers and established coding standards

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed responsive web applications using React and Node.js, collaborated with design teams to implement user-friendly interfaces
achievements: Built 10+ responsive websites with modern frameworks
Integrated third-party APIs and payment systems
Reduced loading times by 50% through optimization techniques

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Created interactive user interfaces and collaborated with backend developers to integrate APIs and ensure seamless user experience
achievements: Developed reusable component library used across 5 projects
Implemented responsive design for mobile-first approach
Collaborated with UX team to improve user engagement by 30%

experience.title: Junior Web Developer
experience.description: Learned modern web development practices, contributed to various client projects, and gained experience in both frontend and backend technologies
